Methods in com.psddev.cms.db that return Page
static Page PageFilter.getPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Deprecated. Use PageFilter.Static.getPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest) instead. To maintain backward compatibility, this method will return a null instead of looking for the most appropriate page to render with, if it's called before PageFilter.doRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain).
static Page PageFilter.Static.getPage(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Returns the page used to render the given request.
